item.title: 【Requests】[REQ CAP] - Rock am Ring 2023 Livestream
item.description:
RTL will be broadcasting Rock am Ring performances this weekend.
They will be streaming Mandora & Utopia stages during three days, starting on Friday!

As far as I remember, there was a DRM last year.

Links:
Day 1 - Mandora Stage: https://www.tvnow.de/live-tv/events/mandora-stage-freitag-965765
Day 1 - Utopia Stage: https://www.tvnow.de/live-tv/events/utopia-stage-freitag-965762
Day 2 - Mandora Stage: https://www.tvnow.de/live-tv/events/mandora-stage-samstag-965766
Day 2 - Utopia Stage: https://www.tvnow.de/live-tv/events/utopia-stage-samstag-965763
Day 3 - Mandora Stage: https://www.tvnow.de/live-tv/events/mandora-stage-sonntag-965767
Day 3 - Utopia Stage: https://www.tvnow.de/live-tv/events/utopia-stage-sonntag-965764
item.author: vikwinchester
